document_data.name: Jang
document_data.mainbody: '''Jang''' was a member of the [[Marsember Watch]] in [[Cormyr]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was [[Kleef Kenric|Kleef Kenric's]] first blade.
document_data.Personality: He was a loyal and dedicated watchman, who lived an honorable life. He had notable skill as a swordsman.
document_data.Possessions: Unique among his comrades in the Watch, Jang wielded a sleek ''[[katana]]''.
document_data.Relationships: Jang had a good relationship with his superior officer, Topsword [[Kleef Kenric]], and could regularly be relied upon to carry out important tasks.
document_data.History:
On [[Uktar 2]] of the {{YearlinkName|1486}}, Jang was part of a contingent of [[Marsember Watch]] and [[Seasilver|House Seasilver]] guards who accompanied Kleef Kenric; [[Arietta Seasilver]]; and two Chosen, [[Malik el Sami]], follower of [[Cyric]], and [[Joelle Emmeline]], follower of [[Sune]], out of Marsember in order to fulfill their mission to rescue [[Elira Seasilver]].

During their sea voyage, he was the only watchman to stay behind when all the other watchmen tried to deceive Prince [[Yder Tanthul]] and his men into believing that the ''[[Eye of Gruumsh (relic)|Eye of Gruumsh]]'' was with them. With the Shadovar busy, Jang, Kleef, and the others assaulted the ''[[Wave Wyvern]]'', a vessel the Shadovar had commandeered. Afterward, Jang and the other watchmen were tasked with taking Arietta's mother, who had been the Shadovar's prisoner, to safety.
